name: Faculty CPT WordPress Plugin
author: Hemant Kothari

sections.description: The plugin gives you flexibility for adding the custom post type with detailed information using meta boxes. It is as easy as you add like any normal post.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress

  3. Find this settings from the WordPress Dashboard named Person CPT.
sections.faq:
Who can use Faculty CPT plugin?

Basically, this plugin is for everyone who needs to add Custom Post Type to their site without writing code.

How Faculty CPT is useful?

This plugin provides you the privileges for adding details of your faculty or employee by using custom post type. Also, you can add more details with the help of meta boxes. It is easy to use just like you use the post of WordPress. It will be useful in such cases like Administrative offices, University students/teachers data, Hospital staff etc.

description: The plugin gives you flexibility for adding the custom post type with detailed information using meta boxes. It is as easy as you add like any normal post.
